column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This is definitely one of the better chic restaurant bars which I have been to in Houston. The atmosphere is great with the candlelights on the table (real one's
column2: not just electric one's like many restaurants these days)
column3: the open windows letting the breeze throughout the restaurant
column4: etc. The restaurant also maintained a slightly below average noise volume - I could hear my date across the table :)
